channel.title: Journal on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Journal on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Monthly Journal January
item.description: What I’m thinking Year of visualization What happened Delights Struggle What I’m thinking The Meaning of Social I have never been a social person, it is rarely fun for me in party or social gatherings, nor is it easy for me to get to know people in those events. But as I’m getting older, I started seeing the importance of getting out of my friend/work cycle, especially when I’m not content with what I have(I rarely am, but that’s another topic).

item.title: What I have been up to (Aug & Sep)
item.description: Motivation for writing this I have always enjoyed sharing what I have learned, what excites me, and what I am pondering. However, more often than not, the people around me are not as enthusiastic about these topics as I am. It is understandable, actually. We live in an information-overloaded world, where everyone has a constant feed of social media. I figured that I could write things down for my own future reference.

item.title: I got my motorcycle back! âœŒ
item.description: How it started I got an internet call(anonymous call) at 11 am, I hesitated a few seconds to answer because most of those calls are just scams, but I took it. It was a female voice saying she is a police officer and my motorcycle is found and it’s in Fremont, she wanted me to stop by ASAP. I was like, What??!! ðŸ˜®ðŸ˜® I got ecstatic immediately, my bike has gone missing over 2 weeks, I’ve already crossed off my shopping list for my bike.
